Hereâ€™s what lies ahead:ğŸ”¹ Cloud-First DevelopmentTighter integration with Azure for seamless deployments, monitoring, and scaling.More serverless options and enhanced microservices support to reduce infrastructure overhead.ğŸ”¹ Blazor and WebAssembly BoomBlazor is revolutionizing web development by running C# directly in the browser via WebAssembly.Less reliance on JavaScript for interactivity, leading to streamlined development.ğŸ”¹ AI & Machine Learning Integration.NET will continue supporting AI/ML services, making chatbots, predictive analytics, and automation more accessible.Expect improved tools for fast AI model deployment.ğŸ”¹ More Efficient Cross-Platform Development.NET MAUI will enable a single codebase to run across Windows, Android, iOS, and macOS.ğŸ”¹ Enhanced Security & PerformanceAdvanced authentication protocols and encryption mechanisms to tackle growing cybersecurity concerns.Performance improvements focusing on speed and resource optimization.ğŸ” The ASP.NET landscape is shifting toward cloud-native, AI-enhanced, cross-platform, and highly secure solutions. Developers who embrace these trends will stay ahead in this ever-evolving industry.ğŸ’¡ What are your thoughts on the future of ASP.NET? I hate that I present as an independent woman who doesnâ€™t need help. Itâ€™s a facade. Help meeeee.For real thoughâ€”Iâ€™m in another transitional season and trying to be loud and honest about it. Iâ€™m figuring out whatâ€™s next, professionally and creatively, and while Iâ€™m resourceful as hellâ€¦ Iâ€™m also tired of doing it all alone. Itâ€™s April, and I now have time for NEW things!So hereâ€™s where Iâ€™m at (right now):â€” Iâ€™m looking for contract or project-based work that gives me space to keep building out my own thing(s).â€” My sweet spot is org development, strategic execution, leadership/culture work, and making teams run smoother and more human.â€” I also offer connection coaching (for individuals and couples)â€”think clarity, communication, and building healthier relationships with self and others. This spans from professional development to relational developmentâ€¦ Itâ€™s all connected. And Iâ€™m reworking my offeringsâ€”thinking tools, workshops, and possibly a course or two. Iâ€™ll be getting louder and clearer soon, but Iâ€™d love to hear from you:What would you actually want to see from me? What would you pay for? What would help you, your team, or your org right now?So yesâ€”help me:â€” Find aligned paid work (consulting contracts, project roles, special projects, fractional Chief of Staff / Director of Special Projects roles, coaching clients)â€” Share this post if it might land with someone in your orbitâ€” Just reach out and say hey if youâ€™ve been meaning toThanks in advance for seeing me, for sharing, for helping, for not believing the hype that Iâ€™ve got it all together. Becauseâ€¦ lol. Weâ€™re all figuring it out.(And yes, mutual aid welcomeâ€”sharing, tagging, hiring, referring, or just checking in all count as support.)

I hate that I present as an independent woman who doesnâ€™t need help. Itâ€™s a facade. Help meeeee.For real thoughâ€”Iâ€™m in another transitional season and trying to be loud and honest about it. Iâ€™m figuring out whatâ€™s next, professionally and creatively, and while Iâ€™m resourceful as hellâ€¦ Iâ€™m also tired of doing it all alone. Itâ€™s April, and I now have time for NEW things!So hereâ€™s where Iâ€™m at (right now):â€” Iâ€™m looking for contract or project-based work that gives me space to keep building out my own thing(s).â€” My sweet spot is org development, strategic execution, leadership/culture work, and making teams run smoother and more human.â€” I also offer connection coaching (for individuals and couples)â€”think clarity, communication, and building healthier relationships with self and others. This spans from professional development to relational developmentâ€¦ Itâ€™s all connected. And Iâ€™m reworking my offeringsâ€”thinking tools, workshops, and possibly a course or two. Iâ€™ll be getting louder and clearer soon, but Iâ€™d love to hear from you:What would you actually want to see from me? What would you pay for? What would help you, your team, or your org right now?So yesâ€”help me:â€” Find aligned paid work (consulting contracts, project roles, special projects, fractional Chief of Staff / Director of Special Projects roles, coaching clients)â€” Share this post if it might land with someone in your orbitâ€” Just reach out and say hey if youâ€™ve been meaning toThanks in advance for seeing me, for sharing, for helping, for not believing the hype that Iâ€™ve got it all together. Becauseâ€¦ lol. Weâ€™re all figuring it out.(And yes, mutual aid welcomeâ€”sharing, tagging, hiring, referring, or just checking in all count as support.)

Itâ€™s April, and I now have time for NEW things!So hereâ€™s where Iâ€™m at (right now):â€” Iâ€™m looking for contract or project-based work that gives me space to keep building out my own thing(s).â€” My sweet spot is org development, strategic execution, leadership/culture work, and making teams run smoother and more human.â€” I also offer connection coaching (for individuals and couples)â€”think clarity, communication, and building healthier relationships with self and others. This spans from professional development to relational developmentâ€¦ Itâ€™s all connected. And Iâ€™m reworking my offeringsâ€”thinking tools, workshops, and possibly a course or two. Iâ€™ll be getting louder and clearer soon, but Iâ€™d love to hear from you:What would you actually want to see from me? What would you pay for? What would help you, your team, or your org right now?So yesâ€”help me:â€” Find aligned paid work (consulting contracts, project roles, special projects, fractional Chief of Staff / Director of Special Projects roles, coaching clients)â€” Share this post if it might land with someone in your orbitâ€” Just reach out and say hey if youâ€™ve been meaning toThanks in advance for seeing me, for sharing, for helping, for not believing the hype that Iâ€™ve got it all together. I hate that I present as an independent woman who doesnâ€™t need help. Itâ€™s a facade. Help meeeee.For real thoughâ€”Iâ€™m in another transitional season and trying to be loud and honest about it. Iâ€™m figuring out whatâ€™s next, professionally and creatively, and while Iâ€™m resourceful as hellâ€¦ Iâ€™m also tired of doing it all alone. Itâ€™s April, and I now have time for NEW things!So hereâ€™s where Iâ€™m at (right now):â€” Iâ€™m looking for contract or project-based work that gives me space to keep building out my own thing(s).â€” My sweet spot is org development, strategic execution, leadership/culture work, and making teams run smoother and more human.â€” I also offer connection coaching (for individuals and couples)â€”think clarity, communication, and building healthier relationships with self and others. This spans from professional development to relational developmentâ€¦ Itâ€™s all connected. And Iâ€™m reworking my offeringsâ€”thinking tools, workshops, and possibly a course or two. Iâ€™ll be getting louder and clearer soon, but Iâ€™d love to hear from you:What would you actually want to see from me? What would you pay for? What would help you, your team, or your org right now?So yesâ€”help me:â€” Find aligned paid work (consulting contracts, project roles, special projects, fractional Chief of Staff / Director of Special Projects roles, coaching clients)â€” Share this post if it might land with someone in your orbitâ€” Just reach out and say hey if youâ€™ve been meaning toThanks in advance for seeing me, for sharing, for helping, for not believing the hype that Iâ€™ve got it all together. Becauseâ€¦ lol. Weâ€™re all figuring it out.(And yes, mutual aid welcomeâ€”sharing, tagging, hiring, referring, or just checking in all count as support.)

I hate that I present as an independent woman who doesnâ€™t need help. Itâ€™s a facade. Help meeeee.For real thoughâ€”Iâ€™m in another transitional season and trying to be loud and honest about it. Iâ€™m figuring out whatâ€™s next, professionally and creatively, and while Iâ€™m resourceful as hellâ€¦ Iâ€™m also tired of doing it all alone. Itâ€™s April, and I now have time for NEW things!So hereâ€™s where Iâ€™m at (right now):â€” Iâ€™m looking for contract or project-based work that gives me space to keep building out my own thing(s).â€” My sweet spot is org development, strategic execution, leadership/culture work, and making teams run smoother and more human.â€” I also offer connection coaching (for individuals and couples)â€”think clarity, communication, and building healthier relationships with self and others. This spans from professional development to relational developmentâ€¦ Itâ€™s all connected. And Iâ€™m reworking my offeringsâ€”thinking tools, workshops, and possibly a course or two. Iâ€™ll be getting louder and clearer soon, but Iâ€™d love to hear from you:What would you actually want to see from me? What would you pay for? What would help you, your team, or your org right now?So yesâ€”help me:â€” Find aligned paid work (consulting contracts, project roles, special projects, fractional Chief of Staff / Director of Special Projects roles, coaching clients)â€” Share this post if it might land with someone in your orbitâ€” Just reach out and say hey if youâ€™ve been meaning toThanks in advance for seeing me, for sharing, for helping, for not believing the hype that Iâ€™ve got it all together. Becauseâ€¦ lol. Weâ€™re all figuring it out.(And yes, mutual aid welcomeâ€”sharing, tagging, hiring, referring, or just checking in all count as support.)

I hate that I present as an independent woman who doesnâ€™t need help. Itâ€™s a facade. Help meeeee.For real thoughâ€”Iâ€™m in another transitional season and trying to be loud and honest about it. Iâ€™m figuring out whatâ€™s next, professionally and creatively, and while Iâ€™m resourceful as hellâ€¦ Iâ€™m also tired of doing it all alone. Itâ€™s April, and I now have time for NEW things!So hereâ€™s where Iâ€™m at (right now):â€” Iâ€™m looking for contract or project-based work that gives me space to keep building out my own thing(s).â€” My sweet spot is org development, strategic execution, leadership/culture work, and making teams run smoother and more human.â€” I also offer connection coaching (for individuals and couples)â€”think clarity, communication, and building healthier relationships with self and others. This spans from professional development to relational developmentâ€¦ Itâ€™s all connected. And Iâ€™m reworking my offeringsâ€”thinking tools, workshops, and possibly a course or two. Iâ€™ll be getting louder and clearer soon, but Iâ€™d love to hear from you:What would you actually want to see from me? What would you pay for? What would help you, your team, or your org right now?So yesâ€”help me:â€” Find aligned paid work (consulting contracts, project roles, special projects, fractional Chief of Staff / Director of Special Projects roles, coaching clients)â€” Share this post if it might land with someone in your orbitâ€” Just reach out and say hey if youâ€™ve been meaning toThanks in advance for seeing me, for sharing, for helping, for not believing the hype that Iâ€™ve got it all together. Becauseâ€¦ lol. Weâ€™re all figuring it out.(And yes, mutual aid welcomeâ€”sharing, tagging, hiring, referring, or just checking in all count as support.)

I hate that I present as an independent woman who doesnâ€™t need help. Itâ€™s a facade. Help meeeee.For real thoughâ€”Iâ€™m in another transitional season and trying to be loud and honest about it. Iâ€™m figuring out whatâ€™s next, professionally and creatively, and while Iâ€™m resourceful as hellâ€¦ Iâ€™m also tired of doing it all alone. Itâ€™s April, and I now have time for NEW things!So hereâ€™s where Iâ€™m at (right now):â€” Iâ€™m looking for contract or project-based work that gives me space to keep building out my own thing(s).â€” My sweet spot is org development, strategic execution, leadership/culture work, and making teams run smoother and more human.â€” I also offer connection coaching (for individuals and couples)â€”think clarity, communication, and building healthier relationships with self and others. This spans from professional development to relational developmentâ€¦ Itâ€™s all connected. And Iâ€™m reworking my offeringsâ€”thinking tools, workshops, and possibly a course or two. Iâ€™ll be getting louder and clearer soon, but Iâ€™d love to hear from you:What would you actually want to see from me? What would you pay for? What would help you, your team, or your org right now?So yesâ€”help me:â€” Find aligned paid work (consulting contracts, project roles, special projects, fractional Chief of Staff / Director of Special Projects roles, coaching clients)â€” Share this post if it might land with someone in your orbitâ€” Just reach out and say hey if youâ€™ve been meaning toThanks in advance for seeing me, for sharing, for helping, for not believing the hype that Iâ€™ve got it all together. Becauseâ€¦ lol. Weâ€™re all figuring it out.(And yes, mutual aid welcomeâ€”sharing, tagging, hiring, referring, or just checking in all count as support.)

Itâ€™s April, and I now have time for NEW things!So hereâ€™s where Iâ€™m at (right now):â€” Iâ€™m looking for contract or project-based work that gives me space to keep building out my own thing(s).â€” My sweet spot is org development, strategic execution, leadership/culture work, and making teams run smoother and more human.â€” I also offer connection coaching (for individuals and couples)â€”think clarity, communication, and building healthier relationships with self and others. This spans from professional development to relational developmentâ€¦ Itâ€™s all connected. And Iâ€™m reworking my offeringsâ€”thinking tools, workshops, and possibly a course or two. Iâ€™ll be getting louder and clearer soon, but Iâ€™d love to hear from you:What would you actually want to see from me? What would you pay for? What would help you, your team, or your org right now?So yesâ€”help me:â€” Find aligned paid work (consulting contracts, project roles, special projects, fractional Chief of Staff / Director of Special Projects roles, coaching clients)â€” Share this post if it might land with someone in your orbitâ€” Just reach out and say hey if youâ€™ve been meaning toThanks in advance for seeing me, for sharing, for helping, for not believing the hype that Iâ€™ve got it all together. I hate that I present as an independent woman who doesnâ€™t need help. Itâ€™s a facade. Help meeeee.For real thoughâ€”Iâ€™m in another transitional season and trying to be loud and honest about it. Iâ€™m figuring out whatâ€™s next, professionally and creatively, and while Iâ€™m resourceful as hellâ€¦ Iâ€™m also tired of doing it all alone. Itâ€™s April, and I now have time for NEW things!So hereâ€™s where Iâ€™m at (right now):â€” Iâ€™m looking for contract or project-based work that gives me space to keep building out my own thing(s).â€” My sweet spot is org development, strategic execution, leadership/culture work, and making teams run smoother and more human.â€” I also offer connection coaching (for individuals and couples)â€”think clarity, communication, and building healthier relationships with self and others. This spans from professional development to relational developmentâ€¦ Itâ€™s all connected. And Iâ€™m reworking my offeringsâ€”thinking tools, workshops, and possibly a course or two. Iâ€™ll be getting louder and clearer soon, but Iâ€™d love to hear from you:What would you actually want to see from me? What would you pay for? What would help you, your team, or your org right now?So yesâ€”help me:â€” Find aligned paid work (consulting contracts, project roles, special projects, fractional Chief of Staff / Director of Special Projects roles, coaching clients)â€” Share this post if it might land with someone in your orbitâ€” Just reach out and say hey if youâ€™ve been meaning toThanks in advance for seeing me, for sharing, for helping, for not believing the hype that Iâ€™ve got it all together. Becauseâ€¦ lol. Weâ€™re all figuring it out.(And yes, mutual aid welcomeâ€”sharing, tagging, hiring, referring, or just checking in all count as support.)

Hereâ€™s what lies ahead:ğŸ”¹ Cloud-First DevelopmentTighter integration with Azure for seamless deployments, monitoring, and scaling.More serverless options and enhanced microservices support to reduce infrastructure overhead.ğŸ”¹ Blazor and WebAssembly BoomBlazor is revolutionizing web development by running C# directly in the browser via WebAssembly.Less reliance on JavaScript for interactivity, leading to streamlined development.ğŸ”¹ AI & Machine Learning Integration.NET will continue supporting AI/ML services, making chatbots, predictive analytics, and automation more accessible.Expect improved tools for fast AI model deployment.ğŸ”¹ More Efficient Cross-Platform Development.NET MAUI will enable a single codebase to run across Windows, Android, iOS, and macOS.ğŸ”¹ Enhanced Security & PerformanceAdvanced authentication protocols and encryption mechanisms to tackle growing cybersecurity concerns.Performance improvements focusing on speed and resource optimization.ğŸ” The ASP.NET landscape is shifting toward cloud-native, AI-enhanced, cross-platform, and highly secure solutions. Developers who embrace these trends will stay ahead in this ever-evolving industry.ğŸ’¡ What are your thoughts on the future of ASP.NET? I hate that I present as an independent woman who doesnâ€™t need help. Itâ€™s a facade. Help meeeee.For real thoughâ€”Iâ€™m in another transitional season and trying to be loud and honest about it. Iâ€™m figuring out whatâ€™s next, professionally and creatively, and while Iâ€™m resourceful as hellâ€¦ Iâ€™m also tired of doing it all alone. Itâ€™s April, and I now have time for NEW things!So hereâ€™s where Iâ€™m at (right now):â€” Iâ€™m looking for contract or project-based work that gives me space to keep building out my own thing(s).â€” My sweet spot is org development, strategic execution, leadership/culture work, and making teams run smoother and more human.â€” I also offer connection coaching (for individuals and couples)â€”think clarity, communication, and building healthier relationships with self and others. This spans from professional development to relational developmentâ€¦ Itâ€™s all connected. And Iâ€™m reworking my offeringsâ€”thinking tools, workshops, and possibly a course or two. Iâ€™ll be getting louder and clearer soon, but Iâ€™d love to hear from you:What would you actually want to see from me? What would you pay for? What would help you, your team, or your org right now?So yesâ€”help me:â€” Find aligned paid work (consulting contracts, project roles, special projects, fractional Chief of Staff / Director of Special Projects roles, coaching clients)â€” Share this post if it might land with someone in your orbitâ€” Just reach out and say hey if youâ€™ve been meaning toThanks in advance for seeing me, for sharing, for helping, for not believing the hype that Iâ€™ve got it all together. Becauseâ€¦ lol. Weâ€™re all figuring it out.(And yes, mutual aid welcomeâ€”sharing, tagging, hiring, referring, or just checking in all count as support.)

I hate that I present as an independent woman who doesnâ€™t need help. Itâ€™s a facade. Help meeeee.For real thoughâ€”Iâ€™m in another transitional season and trying to be loud and honest about it. Iâ€™m figuring out whatâ€™s next, professionally and creatively, and while Iâ€™m resourceful as hellâ€¦ Iâ€™m also tired of doing it all alone. Itâ€™s April, and I now have time for NEW things!So hereâ€™s where Iâ€™m at (right now):â€” Iâ€™m looking for contract or project-based work that gives me space to keep building out my own thing(s).â€” My sweet spot is org development, strategic execution, leadership/culture work, and making teams run smoother and more human.â€” I also offer connection coaching (for individuals and couples)â€”think clarity, communication, and building healthier relationships with self and others. This spans from professional development to relational developmentâ€¦ Itâ€™s all connected. And Iâ€™m reworking my offeringsâ€”thinking tools, workshops, and possibly a course or two. Iâ€™ll be getting louder and clearer soon, but Iâ€™d love to hear from you:What would you actually want to see from me? What would you pay for? What would help you, your team, or your org right now?So yesâ€”help me:â€” Find aligned paid work (consulting contracts, project roles, special projects, fractional Chief of Staff / Director of Special Projects roles, coaching clients)â€” Share this post if it might land with someone in your orbitâ€” Just reach out and say hey if youâ€™ve been meaning toThanks in advance for seeing me, for sharing, for helping, for not believing the hype that Iâ€™ve got it all together. Becauseâ€¦ lol. Weâ€™re all figuring it out.(And yes, mutual aid welcomeâ€”sharing, tagging, hiring, referring, or just checking in all count as support.)

I hate that I present as an independent woman who doesnâ€™t need help. Itâ€™s a facade. Help meeeee.For real thoughâ€”Iâ€™m in another transitional season and trying to be loud and honest about it. Iâ€™m figuring out whatâ€™s next, professionally and creatively, and while Iâ€™m resourceful as hellâ€¦ Iâ€™m also tired of doing it all alone. Itâ€™s April, and I now have time for NEW things!So hereâ€™s where Iâ€™m at (right now):â€” Iâ€™m looking for contract or project-based work that gives me space to keep building out my own thing(s).â€” My sweet spot is org development, strategic execution, leadership/culture work, and making teams run smoother and more human.â€” I also offer connection coaching (for individuals and couples)â€”think clarity, communication, and building healthier relationships with self and others. This spans from professional development to relational developmentâ€¦ Itâ€™s all connected. And Iâ€™m reworking my offeringsâ€”thinking tools, workshops, and possibly a course or two. Iâ€™ll be getting louder and clearer soon, but Iâ€™d love to hear from you:What would you actually want to see from me? What would you pay for? What would help you, your team, or your org right now?So yesâ€”help me:â€” Find aligned paid work (consulting contracts, project roles, special projects, fractional Chief of Staff / Director of Special Projects roles, coaching clients)â€” Share this post if it might land with someone in your orbitâ€” Just reach out and say hey if youâ€™ve been meaning toThanks in advance for seeing me, for sharing, for helping, for not believing the hype that Iâ€™ve got it all together. Becauseâ€¦ lol. Weâ€™re all figuring it out.(And yes, mutual aid welcomeâ€”sharing, tagging, hiring, referring, or just checking in all count as support.)

I hate that I present as an independent woman who doesnâ€™t need help. Itâ€™s a facade. Help meeeee.For real thoughâ€”Iâ€™m in another transitional season and trying to be loud and honest about it. Iâ€™m figuring out whatâ€™s next, professionally and creatively, and while Iâ€™m resourceful as hellâ€¦ Iâ€™m also tired of doing it all alone. Itâ€™s April, and I now have time for NEW things!So hereâ€™s where Iâ€™m at (right now):â€” Iâ€™m looking for contract or project-based work that gives me space to keep building out my own thing(s).â€” My sweet spot is org development, strategic execution, leadership/culture work, and making teams run smoother and more human.â€” I also offer connection coaching (for individuals and couples)â€”think clarity, communication, and building healthier relationships with self and others. This spans from professional development to relational developmentâ€¦ Itâ€™s all connected. And Iâ€™m reworking my offeringsâ€”thinking tools, workshops, and possibly a course or two. Iâ€™ll be getting louder and clearer soon, but Iâ€™d love to hear from you:What would you actually want to see from me? What would you pay for? What would help you, your team, or your org right now?So yesâ€”help me:â€” Find aligned paid work (consulting contracts, project roles, special projects, fractional Chief of Staff / Director of Special Projects roles, coaching clients)â€” Share this post if it might land with someone in your orbitâ€” Just reach out and say hey if youâ€™ve been meaning toThanks in advance for seeing me, for sharing, for helping, for not believing the hype that Iâ€™ve got it all together. Becauseâ€¦ lol. Weâ€™re all figuring it out.(And yes, mutual aid welcomeâ€”sharing, tagging, hiring, referring, or just checking in all count as support.)
